about_the_game:
In this game, you will play an exile who has lost his memory, exploring an unknown world. Cultivate randomly generated characters or "reincarnators" with storylines in the game to find ways to escape this world. The game will have many exploratory elements and branches. And cultivate your team to ultimately rule or escape the world within 100 days.

1. Randomly generated characters containing more than 10 reincarnators and infinite possibilities

2. It will include more than 30 skills that can be freely matched (the complete version will reach more than 100)

3. With the avatar, the avatar will take effect on the "exiles". At present, there are more than 30 kinds of clothes.

4. With a free exploration system, you can go out and explore according to your own preferences or unlimited brushing in a fixed area.

5. With a large number of branches, every choice you make will have a profound impact on the future
